title: Rapha North America Abruptly Closes Bentonville Office, Lays Off Staff
content:
CEO says the brand will continue to have a presence in northwest Arkansas but that lay-offs are due to a 'realignment of strategic priorities and current market dynamics.'

Read the full article at Rapha North America Abruptly Closes Bentonville Office, Lays Off Staff on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
